messages.title: Vote Labour
messages.content: This is the crucial General Election and it's going to be close. Your vote counts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has changed all that and now patients are guaranteed that they will be treated within 18 weeks of being referred to hospital by their doctor.
Surestart Children's Centres offer support to local families.
Tax Credits have changed the lives of thousands of hard working families but are under threat from the Conservatives.
Labour has brought in a number of new benefits for pensioners.

issues.health: Labour has changed all that and now patients are guaranteed that they will be treated within 18 weeks of being referred to hospital by their doctor.

leaflet.personalStatement: Penny Martin. Local Knowledge, for you.

politicalExperience.achievements: Penny has a proven track record as a local Councillor.

endorsements.endorsement: Thanks to the NHS and Labour I am well again.
The Winter Fuel Allowance was a huge help during the recent cold spell.

images.caption: Penny Martin visiting Surestart Children's Centre
